name: Event Horizon
storyline:
Descend into the depths of the event horizon with the assistance of The Motherboard, an artificial intelligence that miraculously survived the crash. Regain the memories of the astronaut as you fight through the deserted Outer, the lush Inner, and the crystalized Center.
Wield the state-of-the-art Nexus-BHG, or Nexus-Black Hole Gun, a powerful hunk of metal capable of harnessing and condensing a black hole's power into a single burst.
When all else fails, the astronaut may upgrade their standard-issued blaster to make an attempt at rivaling the Nexus-BHG's strength.
summary: Event Horizon is an action-adventure sci-fi shooter with the heart of souls-like utilizing gun modification and first-person scanning to explore the unknown depths of the cosmos.
